se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser

Class Utf8ResourceBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser.Utf8ResourceBundle

  • public abstract class Utf8ResourceBundle
extends Object
    Wrapper utility lass which permits using a set of .property files encoded in UTF-8 instead of the ISO-8859-1 which is the only supported encoding within the ResourceBundle class.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utf8ResourceBundle() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ResourceBundle getBundle(String baseName, Locale locale)
      Factory method that creates a ResourceBundle for the provided baseName, and wraps it within an ISO88591 --> UTF-8 transcoding shell in case the acquired ResourceBundle is a PropertyResourceBundle.

      • Utf8ResourceBundle

    • Method Detail

      • getBundle

        public static ResourceBundle getBundle(String baseName,
                                       Locale locale)

        Factory method that creates a ResourceBundle for the provided baseName, and wraps it within an ISO88591 --> UTF-8 transcoding shell in case the acquired ResourceBundle is a PropertyResourceBundle.

        Due to the insanely poor coding of the ResourceBundle class, where the static getBundle(String) method is final, we have to delegate the wrapping to a private, inner class.

        Parameters:
        baseName - the base name of the resource bundle, a fully qualified class name.
        locale - the locale for which a resource bundle is desired.
        Returns:
        Unicode friendly resource bundle.
        See Also:
        ResourceBundle.getBundle(String)
